title: Any item cannot be selected initially in library outline view
description:
Description: Any item in the library outline view cannot be selected on the first attempt.

OB: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the item does not get selected.

EB: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the item should get selected.

SR:
1. Add a label in a library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view.
